mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.group_id AS "groupId", a.phone_type AS "phoneType", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.gateway_id AS "gatewayId", a.level AS "level", u1.name AS "groupName", u2.gateway_name AS "gatewayName"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a4 ON a4.id = a.province_id LEFT JOIN jmsg_group u1 ON u1.id=a.group_id LEFT JOIN jmsg_gateway_info u2 ON u2.id=a.gateway_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jmsg_gateway_group( group_id, phone_type, province_id, gateway_id, level ) VALUES ( #{groupId}, #{phoneType}, #{provinceId}, #{gatewayId}, #{level} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jmsg_gateway_group SET group_id = #{groupId}, phone_type = #{phoneType}, province_id = #{provinceId}, gateway_id = #{gatewayId}, level = #{level} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM jmsg_gateway_group WHERE group_id = #{groupId} AND phone_type = #{phoneType} AND province_id = #{provinceId} AND gateway_id = #{gatewayId}
